MedReconRecommendation.name: MedReconRecommendation
MedReconRecommendation.description: Stores information about a medication recommendation and associates a recommendation to a medication reconciliation.

Description.description: A description of the medication recommendation added to the patient.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MedicationReconciliationId.description: The medication reconciliation with which the medication recommendation is associated.

Name.description: The name of the medication recommendation.

NoteForPatient.description: Recommendation notes to provide additional information to the patient.

NoteForProvider.description: Recommendation notes to provide additional information to the provider.

Priority.description: The priority level of the medication recommendation.

RecommendationReasonSubtype.description: A further categorization of the recommendation reason type.

RecommendationReasonType.description: The reason why the recommendation is added to the patient.

RecommendationSubtype.description: A further categorization of the recommendation type.

RecommendationType.description: The type of medication recommendation added to the patient.

SourceSysModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.
